itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson, Dan Hollaway, and Jessie Wiseman bring you the realest fake news of the week starting with the Coronavirus sweeping the world, Trump's take on TBI with soldiers, PETA wants Punxsutawney Phil to retire, man on trial for marijuana possession lights joint in courtroom, and a British Columbia hotel that is offering people a free 4 hour stay at their hotel if they can prove conception of a baby in there.
